title: Dazzling Appearance
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Shizuku-chan~! Today’s play was really interesting nya~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thank you! I’m glad to hear that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>You were so cool nya~! But you were so different from your usual self. Rin doesn’t know how you can do that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ehehe. I actually built up today’s role with people around me as references.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I took the cool part from Karin-san and Kanan-san and the strong-willed part from Emma-san and Nico-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Is that so~. Rin can kinda see it nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>But the most important aspect of this role is the pure and innocent part. Without it, the cool part wouldn’t stand out.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Heeeh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>And that’s why I put together that part of the performance with you in mind, Rin-san♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eeeh—!? Then that means.... That Rin was a part of the play too....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yeah! I was able to act it out thanks to everyone’s help!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>That’s amazing nya—-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
